scripts.dev:backend: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:payments" "npm run dev:ai-agent"
scripts.dev:frontend: concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:kitchen" "npm run dev:manager"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:backend: npm run build:shared && npm run build:server && npm run build:payments
scripts.build:frontend: npm run build:client && npm run build:kitchen && npm run build:manager
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:backend: cd packages/backend/shared && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../payments && npm install
scripts.install:frontend: cd packages/frontend/client && npm install && cd ../kitchen-display && npm install && cd ../manager-console && npm install
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.clean:backend: cd packages/backend/shared && npm run clean && cd ../server && rm -rf dist && cd ../payments && rm -rf dist
scripts.clean:frontend: cd packages/frontend/client && rm -rf dist && cd ../kitchen-display && rm -rf dist && cd ../manager-console && rm -rf dist
